snippet.textDisplay:
This doesn’t address the question of whether or not it came from a lab, it only suggests (and still doesn’t prove) that this wasn’t a synthetic gain-of-function modification. However, that is not the only way to cause such an event in a lab, intentionally or otherwise. For one thing, your proposed theory of a recombination event in a host with multiple infections could have happened in a lab that is a literal repository of bat coronaviruses. That host could have even been a researcher. It would not be the first time a researcher accidentally infected themselves.

Of course, we aren’t allowed to talk about that on youtube and even this comment is enough to get me banned.
